title: Augur

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, select a player who died the night before. Learn who killed them.
- At night, visit a player. They will be framed as the killer of everyone who dies tonight. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At night, you may speak with the dead, appearing as the Oracle.
- After death, you may Manifest to a player at night, sending one message to them up to 10 words long at the end of the night.
- Retain your background after being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4706
*The voices of the dead call to me.*
